data.title: Financial Information
data.meta_description: Financial analysis of Dangerous (2021) including budget, domestic and international box office gross, DVD and Blu-ray sales reports, total earnings and profitability.
data.text:
Synopsis

Ex-con and reformed sociopath Dylan Forrester is trying to quietly serve out his parole — with the help of a steady supply of antidepressants and his eccentric psychiatrist. But when his brother dies under mysterious circumstances, Dylan breaks parole and, with a dogged FBI agent on his trail, goes to uncover the truth. A band of heavily armed mercenaries wants something Dylan’s brother was hiding, and Dylan will need all his guile and tactical skills to survive.
